answerText: The Island of the Day Before[10] In this novel by the author of The Island of the Day Before, the bored editors Belbo, Casaubon, and Diotavelli concoct a fake conspiracy.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 6 | 16 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This novel's protagonist remembers an imaginary evil brother named Ferrante. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which Roberto della Griva escapes to the mysteriously crewless Daphne after surviving the wreck of the Amaryllis. He cannot swim, but still longs to reach the title location across the International Date Line.
